scripts.bundle-app: yarn run clean-app && yarn run build-app && parcel build -d dist/app --public-url /new/ index.html
scripts.bundle-tests: yarn run clean-tests && yarn run build-tests && parcel build -d dist/test tests.html
scripts.bundle-tests-watch: yarn run build-tests --watch && parcel watch index.html
scripts.serve-app: yarn run clean-app && yarn run build-app && parcel serve index.html
scripts.deploy-app: yarn run bundle-app && gh-pages --dist dist/app --dest new
